Introduction

O.P.P.A, later rebranded to OPPAII, was a seven-member boy group under Beethoven Music. Originally an eight-member group, they released the album "Deathless Love" in December of 1997.

After promoting their 1st album, the group added two more members to the existing eight and divided the group into two units, OPPA 007 and OPPA 180°. Each unit was set to promote with five members. However, OPPA 180° never began activities. They are credited as the first idol group to form units.

The group earned their first ever music win in May of 1998 on the now defunct music show "Show! music tank".
